Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class EntityManager

Makes sure that each game entity that requires synchronization has a corresponding entity in the persistence framework.

Inheritance

Events

| Improve this Doc View Source

OnPlayerControlledEntityOrphaned

Called for each player controlled entity when the controlling player leaves the game. The entity control has already been revoked from the player. This callback is expected to handle any necessary clean up in the game entity system.

Declaration
public event Action<RailServerPeer, RailEntityServer> OnPlayerControlledEntityOrphaned
Event Type
Type Description
System.Action<RailServerPeer, RailEntityServer>
